name: Kill Fish - demo
description:
Kill Fish is a game about a man who tries to change and get away from his past, but instead repeats the same mistakes over and over again. Try on the skin of a tired, emaciated and practically lost hope hero, and reveal all the secrets of the mysterious place in which you find yourself.

In this game you will find:

  • Hand-drawn graphics 
  • Quirky enemy design that will scare and touch 
  • High, but always (almost) fair difficulty level  
  • A mystical story, the true meaning of which will be hard to unravel
